Wishlist.name: Wishlist
Wishlist.description: Represents a buyer-created list of WishlistItems in a store that’s built with B2B Commerce on Lightning.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account that owns the Wishlist.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD. Possible values are:

Name.description: The name of this Wishlist record. Name can be up to 255 characters.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user or group that owns the Wishlist.

WebStoreId.description: The ID of the WebStore related to this Wishlist.

WishlistProductCount.description: The count of WishlistItems on this Wishlist. WishlistProductCount is a calculated field.
